Uses of Class
javafx.scene.input.ZoomEvent

Packages that use ZoomEvent
Package
Description
javafx.scene
Provides the core set of base classes for the JavaFX Scene Graph API.
javafx.scene.input
Provides the set of classes for mouse and keyboard input event handling.

  • Uses of ZoomEvent in javafx.scene.input

    Fields in javafx.scene.input with type parameters of type ZoomEvent
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final EventType<ZoomEvent>
    ZoomEvent.ANY
    Common supertype for all zoom event types.
    static final EventType<ZoomEvent>
    ZoomEvent.ZOOM
    This event occurs when user performs a zooming gesture such as dragging two fingers apart.
    static final EventType<ZoomEvent>
    ZoomEvent.ZOOM_FINISHED
    This event occurs when a zooming gesture ends.
    static final EventType<ZoomEvent>
    ZoomEvent.ZOOM_STARTED
    This event occurs when a zooming gesture is detected.
